title: Various views of the banks of the Ohio River
subtitle: Vineyards below Cincinnati, Bellevue, Parkersburg, Patriot, etc.

source.type: Antique black and white engraved illustration

location.subject: Ohio River banks including areas near Cincinnati

viewpoint.description: Multiple views of Ohio River banks including vineyards below Cincinnati

technical.condition: Very good overall antique condition with mild toning throughout

description: Antique black and white engraved illustration from William Cullen Bryant's classic 1872 work 'Picturesque America' showing various views of the banks of the Ohio River, including vineyards below Cincinnati, Bellevue, Parkersburg, Patriot, and other locations along the river valley.
